properties.description: Script to create a view from HTAP CosmosDB

content.query:
IF (NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.credentials WHERE name = 'ba-cosmosdb1'))
    CREATE CREDENTIAL [ba-cosmosdb1] WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE', SECRET = '<CosmodDBKey>'

IF (NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'htap_cosmosdb'))
   EXEC ('CREATE SCHEMA [htap_cosmosdb]')

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [htap_cosmosdb].[volcano_htap]
AS SELECT id, Country, [Status], Elevation, [Type],Region, [Location]
from OPENROWSET(â€‹PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=ba-cosmosdb1;Database=SampleDB',
                OBJECT = 'Volcano_HTAP',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'ba-cosmosdb1'
) WITH
    (id varchar(50),
    Country varchar(50),
    Status varchar(20),
    Elevation int,
    Type varchar(20),
    Region varchar(100),
    Location varchar(1000)) as rows
